summary: 17 CFR § 240.10b5-2 outlines the duties of trust or confidence relevant to misappropriation insider trading cases under Section 10(b) of the Securities Exchange Act and Rule 10b-5, specifying circumstances where such duties exist, including agreements to maintain confidentiality, established patterns of sharing confidences, and familial relationships. The rule does not alter other aspects of insider trading law.
